section.title: Implementation
section.para: Since there is no a-priori reason that all tables that contain LookupList tables put them at the same place (or put pointers to them at the same place), we need an abstract method to get the offset of the LookupList table.
section.code-fragment: Method to get the offset of LookupList abstract int getLookupListOffset ();
section.para: We can then find the offset of a Lookup.
